Target lesion ( ) must locate native coronary artery visually estimate reference vessel diameter ( RVD ) ≥2.25 mm ≤4.0 mm , length must ≤34* mm ( visual estimate ) , Target lesion ( ) must visually estimate stenosis ≥50 % < 100 % thrombolysis Myocardial Infarction ( TIMI ) flow > 1 Key 1 .
